plot: It's 1891 and military doctor, John Watson has returned home to England. Seeking lodgings at an affordable price, he finds himself at 221B Baker St. Where he meets a young, volatile, brilliant and eccentric woman.... named Sherlock Holmes.
plot_en: It's 1891 and military doctor, John Watson has returned home to England. Seeking lodgings at an affordable price, he finds himself at 221B Baker St. Where he meets a young, volatile, brilliant and eccentric woman.... named Sherlock Holmes.

title: 221B
